Technique: ROUGH-HEWN; WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Horus falcon
Description: The recto of this small fragment represents the solar falcon with flagellum, of which the claws suggest seals. Behind the bird we find we find the hieroglyph designiating the 'rising'. On the verso, we can distinguish four fragmentary lines written in hieratic script.
